Package alluxio.client.block

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BlockMasterClient
    A client to use for interacting with a Block Master.
    BlockWorkerClient
    Interface for an Alluxio block worker client.
    UnderStoreBlockInStream.UnderStoreStreamFactory
    A factory which can create an input stream to under storage.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlluxioBlockStore
    Alluxio Block Store client.
    BlockInStream
    This class represents a stream to a block in the Alluxio system.
    BlockMasterClientPool
    Class for managing block master clients.
    BlockStoreContext
    A shared context for each master for common block master client functionality such as a pool of master clients and a pool of local worker clients.
    BlockWorkerInfo
    Information of an active block worker.
    BufferedBlockInStream
    Provides a stream API to read a block from Alluxio.
    BufferedBlockOutStream
    Provides a stream API to write a block to Alluxio.
    LocalBlockInStream
    This class provides a streaming API to read a block in Alluxio.
    LocalBlockOutStream
    Provides a streaming API to write to an Alluxio block.
    RemoteBlockInStream
    This class provides a streaming API to read a block in Alluxio.
    RemoteBlockOutStream
    Provides a streaming API to write to an Alluxio block.
    RetryHandlingBlockMasterClient
    A wrapper for the thrift client to interact with the block master, used by alluxio clients.
    RetryHandlingBlockWorkerClient
    The client talks to a block worker server.
    RetryHandlingBlockWorkerClient.Metrics
    Metrics related to the RetryHandlingBlockWorkerClient.
    UnderStoreBlockInStream
    This class provides a streaming API to read a fixed chunk from a file in the under storage system.
